summary: Normalized fallback envelope semantics across RL, Skills, and Learning APIs
details: Aligned /api/rl, /api/skills, and /api/learning responses to include consistent fallback metadata fields (`fallback`, `data_fidelity`, `status_reason`) across success, missing-state, malformed-state, file-fallback, and unexpected-error paths.
impact: Medium - client control plane can reliably interpret fallback/degraded/live responses across API boundaries
